review: A brillant social comentary on the state of gaming in the modern era.
Great if you love those games that make you rage quit, awful for everyone else.
Spec Ops is fantastic, it has an amazing story line I love it. Totaly worth it!

Alittle repetative but the game is overall not bad, haven't played Torchlight II yet but hopeing they've improved on this game as its wide open growth. Give it a go its good for some casual smash and grab
